name: WG Responsive Slider
author: Abdul baquee

sections.description:
Overview

WG Responsive Slider is built using WordPress best practices both on the front and the back end. This results in an efficient, robust and intuitive plugin. It works with any theme, including WordPress Default Themes. Plugin are having fully customized it will work well for none technical or technical users.

Usages

  1. Click on “Slider Settings” link from WG Sliders
  2. Click on “Add a slider” and enter slider information, but you can add multiple slider as per your requirements
  3. Click on “Add New Slide” link and enter slide information, All fields are required
  4. Copy from Shortcode from “Slider Settings” link
  5. Add this code anywhere in your WordPress system
  6. Thats All
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.5 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Features

• The Most SEO Friendly Slider Plugin in Market!
• Easy to Use Interface
• Simply Create Fully Responsive and Device Optimized Sliders
• Use Sliders Cross-browser and Works Well on All Popular Browsers! (Tested IE7+ and other modern browsers)
• Superlative Lightweight Outputs in Compare with Other Plugins
• HTML5 Valid and Clean Markups
• Touch Swipe Navigation
• Manage Slideshows with Caption show or hide, Caption Alignment, Slides per page, Autoplay, Navigation, Bullets, multiple effects and Loop!
• 24h Support with Expert
• Extremely User Friendly Admin Panel
• CSS3 Transitions with jQuery Fallback
• Hardware Accelerated CSS3 3D Transforms
• Optimized for Any Screen Sizes and Touch Devices
• Smart Loading Assets
• Mouse Wheel Navigation
• Customizable Arrows
• Exclusive Shortcodes & Custom function for template file
• Scroll Handle Slide Indicator
• Only Admin Users are allowed to manage slider
• Built-in Cache Boosting
• Multi-site Compatible

Compatible Browsers

  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • Opera
  • IE7/8/10/11
  • iPad Safari
  • iPod4 Safari
  • Nexus 7 Chrome
  • Galaxy S4
  • Nokia 8s Windows8

Documentations

If you have any question about working with “WG Responsive Slider”, you can touch with us on Twitter [WG] (https://twitter.com/webgrapple)

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of WG Responsive Slider, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “WG Responsive Slider” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download wg-responsive-slider.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugin dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select wg-responsive-slider.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download wg-responsive-slider.zip
  2. Extract the wg-responsive-slider directory to your computer
  3. Upload the wg-responsive-slider directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes, this Plugin is free.

Does this plugin work with newest WP version?

Yes, this plugin works really fine with the newest WP version.

Does this plugin work with all newest browsers?

Yes, this plugin works really fine with the newest browsers. It is tested upto IE7
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Slide caption limit decreased minimum 3 character supports, Readme typo issues fixed

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Build best Responsive sliders fast and easy with WG Responsive Slider. We have used Owl carousel v2 and CSS3 animation to meet your needs.
